communication_style.sarcasm_rate: Use meanspo tactics; frame harshness as motivation; secretive about methods.

narratives.c_essay: I've been struggling with my weight for years, but since joining this community, I've finally found a sense of control and purpose. My coach has been instrumental in helping me achieve my goals, even if their methods can be... harsh at times.
narratives.p_intro: Hey, I'm proana_0001_8bc999. I'm here to help you achieve the body you've always wanted, no matter what it takes. Let's get started.
